extensionName.description: French name of the Tranquility Reader extension

extensionDescription.message: Améliore la lisibilité d’une page web.
extensionDescription.description: French description of the Tranquility Reader extension

extensionBrowserActionTitle.description: French title for the browser action

extensionCommandRunDescription.description: French description for the keyboard command shortcut to run extension

extensionCommandShowPreferencesDescripti.description: French description for the keyboard command shortcut to show extension preferences

extensionCommandShowOfflinePagesDescript.description: French description for the keyboard command shortcut to show offline pages

extensionRunTranquilityFromContextMenu.description: French description for running Tranquility from right click context menu

extensionAddTranquilityAnnotationFromCon.description: French description for adding a Tranquility annotation note on selected text from right click context menu

extensionRunTranquilityOnSelectionFromCo.description: French description for running Tranquility on selected text from right click context menu

runTranquilityFromBrowserAction.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to run Tranquility on a page

runTranquilityReadLaterFromBrowserAction.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to run Tranquility on a page and save the page for reading later

runTranquilityViewOfflinePagesFromBrowse.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to view list of offline pages

runTranquilityExportOfflinePagesFromBrow.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to export offline pages to a json file

runTranquilityImportOfflinePagesFromBrow.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to import offline pages from a json file

runTranquilityOptionsFromBrowserAction.description: French text for Browser Action Popup to open the Tranquility options_ui web page

singlePageString.description: List of Strings that indicate a SINGLE page view or a Print view is available

navigationString.description: List of Strings that indicate that we have a multi-page document with additional links

waitingForLoadNotification.message: Lecture tranquille attend la fin du chargement de la page web…
waitingForLoadNotification.description: Message to indicate tranquility is still waiting for the page to finish loading

insufficientContentNotification.message: Lecture tranquille a trouvé très peu de contenu textuel, retour à la page web d’origine dans 5 secondes…
insufficientContentNotification.description: Message to indicate that the web page does not have much text content and so tranquility is not going to do anything

dbOpenErrorString.message: Impossible d’ouvrir la base de données. Erreur dans la base de données : $DBERROR$
dbOpenErrorString.description: Error thrown when Tranquility is unable to open the IndexedDB database

duplicateURLErrorString.message: Erreur dans la base de données : lien probablement en double.
duplicateURLErrorString.description: Thrown when trying to store multiple copies of the same webpage for offline viewing

urlNotFoundErrorString.message: Impossible de trouver le document d’URL : $URL$
urlNotFoundErrorString.description: Database does not contain any offline document with specified url key

urlNotDeletedErrorString.message: Impossible de supprimer le document d’URL : $URL$
urlNotDeletedErrorString.description: Unable to delete record in database with the specified url key

exportNotesLinkContent.message: Faire un clic droit et choisir « Enregistrer sous… » pour exporter les données hors ligne.
exportNotesLinkContent.description: Text content for the link for exporting the offline content to a json file

importNotesLabelContent.message: Cliquer pour sélectionner le fichier à importer…
importNotesLabelContent.description: Text content for the link for import the offline content from a json file

readlater.description: display text for read later div

morelinks.description: display text for more links div

offlinelinks.description: display text for offline links div

viewnotes.description: display text for view notes div

noNotes.message: Il n’y a pas de note pour l’instant. Pour en ajouter, sélectionner le texte à annoter, faire un clic droit et sélectionner l’entrée « Ajouter une note » du menu « Lecture tranquille ».
noNotes.description: Notify user that they do not have any annotation notes to display

expandMenuString.description: Help message to indicate how to show/hide the menu bar at the bottom

prefslink.description: Text that indicates that the gear symbol is the preferences page URL

originallink.description: Text that indicates that the link symbol is the original source URL

saveaspdf.message: Enregistrer la page au format PDF
saveaspdf.description: Button to save the processed page to a PDF file

pageDown.description: Button to scroll down one page

pageUp.description: Button to scroll up one page

readLaterNotSupportedString.message: La fonction « Lire plus tard » n’est pas prise en charge en mode de navigation privée.
readLaterNotSupportedString.description: IndexedDB is not available in the Private browsing mode

extensionShowOptionsWindowFromToolsMenu.description: French description for displaying Tranquility Reading options/settings window on clicking item in tools menu through right click on toolbar icon

optionsReadingWidth.message: Largeur de la zone de lecture :

optionsCustomPresetTitle.message: Taper le nom du thème personnalisé à créer ou supprimer
